DataElement.preferredName: Grooved Pegboard Test Assessment Left Hand Result Time Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Time measured in seconds for the completion of a task that is part of the Grooved Pegboard Test using the left hand.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Grooved Pegboard Test Assessment Left Hand Result
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A manipulative dexterity test using a pegboard device wiht five rows of five holes.  It features 25 key-style pegs with holes in various positions in space, and is especially good for testing lateralized brain damage._Having determined the value, significance, or extent of._Left; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north._The distal portion of the upper extremity. It consists of the carpus, metacarpus, and digits._Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A manipulative dexterity test using a pegboard device wiht five rows of five holes.  It features 25 key-style pegs with holes in various positions in space, and is especially good for testing lateralized brain damage.
